org.pathvisio.core.model

Class FreeConnectorShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pathvisio.core.model.AbstractConnector
      • org.pathvisio.core.model.SegmentedConnector
        • org.pathvisio.core.model.FreeConnectorShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectorShape

    public class FreeConnectorShape
extends SegmentedConnector
    Implements a connector that draws straight lines between multiple waypoints. In contrast to the automatic connectors (Elbow and Curved), the waypoints can be added/removed freely by the user.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.pathvisio.core.model.ConnectorShape

        public void recalculateShape(ConnectorRestrictions restrictions)
        Description copied from interface: ConnectorShape
        Force the connector to redraw it's path. The cache for segments, waypoints and shape.
        Parameters:
        restrictions - The ConnectorRestrictions that provides the start, end and preferred waypoints

      • hasValidWaypoints

        public boolean hasValidWaypoints(ConnectorRestrictions restrictions)
        Description copied from interface: ConnectorShape
        Checks whether the waypoints as provided by the ConnectorRestrictions are valid and will be used to draw the connector path
        Returns:
